CustomField.description: Specifies the type of Medicaid coverage associated with this insurance policy.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the applicable Medicaid category for this insurance policy: • MQMB (Medicare Qualified Medicare Beneficiary) • QMB (Qualified Medicare Beneficiary) • SLMB (Specified Low-Income Medicare Beneficiary) • QI (Qualifying Individual) Choose the appropriate Medicaid classification to ensure accurate tracking of coverage and eligibility.
CustomField.label: Medicaid
